name: Ramp Attack
description:
Towers are placed in your path at regular intervals.  Place three types of ramps to jump over or through them, collecting as many coins as you can.

Due to the limitations of the Game Jam, the controls are:

  • A - Small ramp
  • X - Medium ramp
  • Space - Large ramp
  • 8 - End game

Music sourced from YouTube Music Library:

  • Main Menu - Late Night Train - Vans in Japan
  • Game Play - Twin Engines by Jeremy Korpas
  • Game Over - Breeze - Delicate Steve

Font sourced from dafont.com:

  • https://www.dafont.com/truck-driver.font

Ground texture sourced from kenney.nl:

  • https://kenney.nl/assets/rpg-base
